item.title: Rewrite this article so it sounds like a human.
item.description:
Danny Richman on Twitter

“1) Created an article using GPT-3. 2) Used Originality AI to detect whether the content was AI or human generated. Score: 100% AI 3) Prompted GPT-3 to rewrite the article “to avoid detection by AI content detection tools”. 4) New Score: 68% Human”

URL: https://twitter.com/DannyRichman/status/1612816421263745027

item.title: Hamline University And Cancel Culture
item.description:
Last March I wrote a self-indulgently long post airing my grievances about the term “cancel culture” and how it’s used in an unprincipled, unproductive way that discourages good discussions rather than encouraging them. My thesis was this: (1) any productive discussion of cancel culture needs a workable definition of it, (2) any principled discussion …
